title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: When using the org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil class in the CLDC version of SWT, a NoClassDefFoundError is thrown. This is because the BidiUtil class uses the Class.forName method, which is not defined in the CLDC class libraries.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:

1. Use the CLDC version of SWT.
2. Use the BidiUtil class.
3. Call a method that involves reflection, such as Class.forName.
4. Observe the NoClassDefFoundError thrown by the CLDC version of SWT.
